sqlMap.insert: insert into sh_log_feeerror(terminalseq, termid, region, operid, orgid, servnumber, paytype, fee, status, recdate, createdate, description) values (#terminalSeq#, #termid#, #region#, #operID#, #orgID#, #servnumber#, #payType#, #fee#, #status#, to_date(#recDate#, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate, #description#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE SH_CHARGE_LOG SET STATUS = #status#, DESCRIPTION = #description#, DEALNUM = #dealnum#
PRESENTSTATUS = #presentStatus#
PRESENTOID = #presentOid#
UNIONPAYUSER = #unionpayuser#
UNIONPAYCODE = #unionpaycode#
, UNIONRETCODE = #posResCode# WHERE CHARGELOGOID = #chargeLogOID#

UPDATE SH_CHARGE_LOG SET UNIONPAYUSER=#unionpayuser#, UNIONPAYCODE=#unionpaycode#, BUSITYPE=#busiType#, BATCHNUM=#batchnum#, AUTHORIZATIONCODE=#authorizationcode#, BUSINESSREFERENCENUM=#businessreferencenum#, UNIONPAYTIME=to_date(#unionpaytime#, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), VOUCHERNUM=#vouchernum#, UNIONPAYFEE=#unionpayfee#, STATUS = #status#, DESCRIPTION = #description#, UNIONRETCODE = #posResCode# WHERE CHARGELOGOID = #chargeLogOID#
sqlMap.select: select step,actid from SH_EXTRACTPRIZE_RULE r where r.rectype=#rectype# and r.status=1
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE SH_CHARGE_LOG SET STATUS = #status#, DESCRIPTION = #description#, DEALNUM = #dealnum#, UNIONRETCODE = #posResCode#
TERMINALSEQ = #terminalSeq#
RECDATE = to_date(#recdate#, 'yyyymmddhh24:mi:ss')
CASHMONEY = CASHMONEY || #cashMoney# || '~', FEE = FEE + #cashMoney# * 100
WHERE CHARGELOGOID = #chargeLogOID# AND ORGID = #orgID# AND REGION = #region#
